rows.heading: Treatment plan
rows.description:
Deworming can help increase your little one's nutritional uptake and manage infections
like anemia or even loose bowels. Moreover, it also helps reduce worm infection that
occurs in the community. 

Deworming also lowers the chances of hospital admission of kids suffering from abdominal pain.

People should always wash their hands both before and after using the toilet to avoid possible exposure.

Itâ€™s recommend that deworming should get done twice a year or every six months from the age of two years old.
